name: Boing Boing Ball
description:
BOING BOING BALL

In Boing Boing Ball your objective is to see how many diamonds you can collect and how long you can survive while trying to dodge the enemies. It's very simple but quite hard at the beginning.

This just a prototype and also my first solo game so don't expect too much. There might be some bugs here and there, so if you find them please message me or leave a comment. Feedback is very appreciated.

*If this gets a good amount of plays I might update it*
